peters_algorithm.base.assembler module¶

class peters_algorithm.base.assembler.Assembler(config_file: dict, xml_dir: str)[source]¶

Bases: object

Assembles assets to corresponding world container

assemble_world() → tuple[peters_algorithm.base.world_container.environment.Environment, list[peters_algorithm.base.world_container.area.Area]][source]¶

Calls the environment and areas and assembles them to create the world as and MJCF object
